html:
Password Reset Request

Hi {{user.firstName}},

We received a request to reset your Qui Browser password. If you made this request, click the button below to reset your password.

Security Notice: This reset link will expire in {{expiresIn}}. For your security, never share this link with anyone.
Reset Password

If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:

{{resetLink}}

If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

Best regards,
The Qui Browser Team

If you have any questions, contact us at support@qui-browser.com
